meanings.definition: A belt of the heavens within about 8° either side of the ecliptic, including all apparent positions of the sun, moon, and most familiar planets.
meanings.sent1: The zodiacs show the positions of the sun and moon in the sky.
meanings.sent2: People often check their zodiacs to see what the future holds.
meanings.sent3: The zodiacs must be busy keeping track of all the planets.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a zodiacs, mapping out the celestial bodies of her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The zodiacs twinkled above, guiding sailors on their journey.

meanings.definition: A diagram representing the signs of the zodiac and their respective symbols.
meanings.sent1: She studied the zodiacs to learn more about astrology.
meanings.sent2: The zodiacs on the chart helped identify different star signs.
meanings.sent3: The zodiacs on the paper looked like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with zodiacs, each symbol holding a different meaning.
meanings.sent5: The zodiacs on the map guided travelers through the night sky.
